ruleTR_R0001.name: Invalid hold_date
ruleTR_R0001.message: Invalid value in DATE/hold_date. hold_date must be within 3 years in YYYYMMDD format.

ruleTR_R0002.name: Missing hold_date
ruleTR_R0002.message: No value in DATE/hold_date. Your data will be immediately released after issuing accession numbers. Input DATE/hold_date if you like to hold your data until academic publication.

ruleTR_R0003.name: Organism warning
ruleTR_R0003.message:
Value of organism qualifier is not found in scientific names of NCBI taxonomy database. Please check spelling and other mistakes.
When the species name is validly published, please ignore this warning. 
In case of novel species and not yet published, please change to a tentative name including with strain/isolate etc. If any other cases, please contact us.

ruleTR_R0004.name: Taxonomy at species or infraspecific rank
ruleTR_R0004.message: Rank of organism should be species or infraspecific level.

ruleTR_R0005.name: Unnecessary WGS keywords
ruleTR_R0005.message: In case of complete genome, KEYWORD "WGS" is not required. Remove it if sequence data are not draft level of genome.

ruleTR_R0006.name: Check by jParser
ruleTR_R0006.message: jParser can not run because of unexpected error.

ruleTR_R0007.name: Check by Transchecker
ruleTR_R0007.message: transChecker can not run because of unexpected error.

ruleTR_R0008.name: Check by AGPParser
ruleTR_R0008.message: AGPParser can not run because of unexpected error.

ruleTR_R0009.name: Missing DBLINK
ruleTR_R0009.message: BioProject and BioSample accessions are required for DBLINK/project and DBLINK/sample. Submit BioProjet and BioSample before sequence submission.

ruleTR_R0010.name: Invalid BioProject accession
ruleTR_R0010.message: DBLINK/project is not in format PRJD##### issued by DDBJ BioProject Accession.

ruleTR_R0011.name: Invalid BioSample accession
ruleTR_R0011.message: DBLINK/sample is not in format SAMD##### issued by DDBJ BioSample Accession.

ruleTR_R0012.name: Invalid DRR accession
ruleTR_R0012.message: DBLINK/sequence read archive is not in format DRR##### issued by DRA Run Accession.

ruleTR_R0013.name: Invalid combination of accessions
ruleTR_R0013.message: DBLINK/project and DBLINK/sample or DBLINK/sequence read archive may not belong to the same BioProject.

ruleTR_R0014.name: Inconsistent submitter
ruleTR_R0014.message: Either accessions of BioProject, BioSample or DRA Run in DBLINK is not submitted from your account.

ruleTR_R0015.name: Inconsistent organism with biosample
ruleTR_R0015.message: Value of either of organism/strain qualifier is not matched with BioSample attribute.

ruleTR_R0016.name: Inconsistent isolate with biosample
ruleTR_R0016.message: Value of isolate qualifier is not matched with BioSample attribute.

ruleTR_R0017.name: Inconsistent isolation_source with biosample
ruleTR_R0017.message: Value of isolation_source qualifier is not matched with BioSample attribute.

ruleTR_R0018.name: Inconsistent collection_date with biosample
ruleTR_R0018.message: Value of collection_date qualifier is not matched with BioSample attribute.

ruleTR_R0019.name: Inconsistent country with biosample
ruleTR_R0019.message: Value of country qualifier is not matched with geo_loc_name in BioSample attribute.

ruleTR_R0020.name: Inconsistent locus_tag_prefix with biosample
ruleTR_R0020.message: Prefix of locus_tag qualifier is not matched wiith locus_tag_prefix in BioSample attribute.

ruleTR_R0021.name: Invalid date format
ruleTR_R0021.message: Invalid /collection_date foramt. Follow ISO 8601 standard "YYYY-mm-dd", "YYYY-mm", "YYYY-mm-ddThh:mm:ss+hh:mm" or "YYYY-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ" (eg., 1990-10-30, 1990-10, 1990-10-30T14:41:36+09:00 or 1990-10-30T14:41:36Z).

ruleTR_R0022.name: Future collection date
ruleTR_R0022.message: Value of collection_date qualifier is a future date. It must be a past date.

ruleTR_R0023.name: Duplicate locus_tag
ruleTR_R0023.message: Values of locus_tag qualifiers are duplicated.

ruleTR_R0024.name: Missing locus_tag
ruleTR_R0024.message: locus_tag qualifier is not found in feature recommended to use.

ruleTR_R0025.name: Suggesting lower taxon
ruleTR_R0025.message: Lower taxon would be used for organism qualifier.

ruleTR_R0026.name: Virus organism name
ruleTR_R0026.message: For frequently submitted viruses, species name without strain/isolate/serotype should be used for organism qualifier.

ruleTR_R0027.name: Oryza sativa organism name
ruleTR_R0027.message: For Oryza sativa, value of organism qualifer should be 'Oryza sativa Indica Group' or 'Oryza sativa Japonica Group'.

ruleTR_R0028.name: Brassica organism name
ruleTR_R0028.message: For genus Brassica, value of organism qualifer should be used with subspecies/variety.

ruleTR_R0029.name: Invalid taxonomy for genome sample
ruleTR_R0029.message: In case of genome from unidentified/unpublished species, a species-level informal name in "[genus] sp. [strain]" or "[family] [strain]" is required for organism qualifier.

ruleTR_R0030.name: Inconsistent culture_collection with biosample
ruleTR_R0030.message: Value of culture_collection qualifier is not matched with BioSample attribute.

ruleTR_R0031.name: Inconsistent host with biosample
ruleTR_R0031.message: Value of host qualifier is not matched with BioSample attribute.

ruleTR_R0033.name: other INSDC partners accession
ruleTR_R0033.message: Accession number in DBLINK is not issued by DDBJ.

ruleTR_R0034.name: Invalid BioProject type
ruleTR_R0034.message: Value of DBLINK/project is umbrella, not primary BioProject accession. It should be primary BioProject accession.
